instruction: Propose moi une recette avec ail, boeuf et riz, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits à coque ni de oeufs
response:
Voici une recette de Pico De Gallo(Hot) :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 25 to 30 jalapeno peppers, chopped fine
- 2 large onions, chopped fine
- 5 large, fresh tomatoes, chopped fine
- 1 bunch cilantro, chopped fine
- 4 lemons
- 1 1/2 c. water

Étapes de préparation :
1. Combine peppers, onions, tomatoes and cilantro.
2. Squeeze the juice of all 4 lemons on mixture.
3. Add water and mix well.
4. If you want it hotter, add 5 to 6 Serrano peppers, chopped real fine. Then drink plenty of water or eat ice cream to cool off.
5. Enjoy!

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec riz et oignons, elle ne doit pas contenir de cacahuètes
response:
Voici une recette de Banana Bread :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 1/2 c. flour
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. packed brown sugar
- 3 1/2 tsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. salt
- 3 Tbsp. oil
- 1/3 c. milk
- 1 egg
- 1 1/4 c. mashed bananas
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Étapes de préparation :
1. Heat oven to 350°.
2. Grease bottom of loaf pan.
3. Mix all ingredients.
4. Beat 30 seconds.
5. Pour into pan.
6. Bake until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean, about 1 hour.
7. Cool slightly and remove from pan.
8. Makes 1 loaf.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poivrons et ail, elle ne doit pas contenir de cacahuètes ni de soja
response:
Voici une recette de Boston Brown Bread :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 c. stone ground rye flour
- 1 c. stone ground corn meal
- 1 c. stone ground whole wheat flour
- 1/2 tsp. baking soda
- 4 tsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. salt
- 3/4 c. molasses
- 1 3/4 c. milk
- 1 c. raisins (optional)

Étapes de préparation :
1. Grease well two 1 pound coffee cans.
2. Place a rack or trivet on the bottom of large pot.
3. Fill pot with water; bring to boil.
4. In large bowl, combine dry ingredients.
5. Combine molasses and milk; add to dry ingredients.
6. Stir in raisins.
7. Fill coffee cans 2/3 full; cover with foil and secure with rubber band.
8. Place cans on trivet in kettle.
9. (Water should come 1/2 up sides of can.)
10. Put lid on pot; keep water at simmer and steam bread 3 hours.
11. Remove from pot; remove foil covers.
12. Place cans in 300° oven for 10 minutes to "dry."

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poisson, boeuf et poivrons, elle ne doit pas contenir de lactose
response:
Voici une recette de Drop Biscuits :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 c. flour
- 1 Tbsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/3 c. shortening
- 1 c. milk

Étapes de préparation :
1. Preheat oven to 450°.
2. Sift together dry ingredients.
3. Cut in shortening until coarse.
4. Make a well in center and pour all the milk.
5. Stir until barely damp.
6. Drop by spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet.
7. Bake 12 to 15 minutes.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec oignons et poisson, elle ne doit pas contenir de lactose
response:
Voici une recette de Bea Steven'S Cottage Cheese Souffle Salad :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon Jell-O
- 1 c. hot water
- 1/2 c. cold water
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. chopped raw spinach or thawed frozen
- 3/4 c. cottage cheese
- 1/3 c. diced celery
- 1 Tbsp. finely chopped onion

Étapes de préparation :
1. Dissolve Jell-O in water, vinegar and salt.
2. Add mayonnaise and beat until smooth.
3. Pour into refrigerator tray and place in freezing compartment 15 to 20 minutes until mixture is set about 1-inch from edges, but soft in center.
4. Turn into bowl and beat again until fluffy.
5. Fold in spinach, cottage cheese, celery and onion.
6. Turn into mold and chill until firm.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec riz, poulet et ail, elle ne doit pas contenir de oeufs ni de lactose
response:
Voici une recette de Refried Bean Casserole :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 Tbsp. oil
- 1 small onion, finely chopped
- 1 small green pepper, finely chopped
- garlic powder
- 4 c. cooked, smashed pinto beans
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 tsp. chili powder
- 1 1/2 c. grated cheese

Étapes de préparation :
1. Heat oil and saute onion and pepper until well softened. Combine with beans, sour cream, chili powder and garlic powder. Turn into 1 1/2-quart casserole.
2. Top with cheese.
3. Bake at 350° for 20 minutes or until hot and bubbly.

Serves 4 to 5.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poivrons et poulet, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits à coque

Voici une recette de Corn-Cheese Delight :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 4 c. whole corn
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. pepper
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 stick margarine
- 1 small can evaporated milk
- 6 slices American cheese

Étapes de préparation :
1. Combine corn, 1 cup of water, salt and pepper in stove top casserole. Cook for 20 minutes.
2. Add sugar, margarine and milk. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring constantly.
3. Arrange cheese on top. Heat until cheese melts.
4. Yields 6 servings.

3. Mix well.

Voici une recette de Oven Porcupines :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1/2 c. uncooked rice
- 1/2 c. water
- 1/3 c. onion, chopped
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. celery salt
- 1/8 tsp. garlic salt
- 1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
- 1 c. water
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire

Étapes de préparation :
1. Mix meat, rice, water, onion, salt, garlic salt and celery salt in bowl.
2. Shape into balls.
3. Place into a 9 x 9-inch or larger baking dish.
4. Mix tomato sauce, 1 cup water and Worcestershire sauce.
5. Pour over meatballs.
6. Cover with foil. Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.
7. Remove foil and cook 15 minutes longer.
8. Makes 12 to 15 meatballs.

Étapes de préparation :

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec tomates, oignons et poivrons, elle ne doit pas contenir de sésame ni de lactose
response:
Voici une recette de Coconut Pie :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 3 Tbsp. sugar
- 6 Tbsp. flour
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 2 c. milk
- 2 egg yolks, slightly beaten
- 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
- 1 Tbsp. butter
- 2 c. coconut
- 2 egg whites
- 4 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 baked 9-inch pie shell
- Cool Whip

Étapes de préparation :
1. Combine sugar, flour and salt; add milk and egg yolks and stir until smooth.
2. Add coconut.
3. Cook until thick.
4. Beat the egg whites until foamy.
5. Add sugar gradually and beat until stiff; fold in hot mixture.
6. Pour in baked pie shell and refrigerate. Top with Cool Whip and sprinkle with coconut.

- 1/2 c. butter, melted
- 1 c. walnuts
- 1 c. chocolate chips

Étapes de préparation :

2. Line 9 x 14-inch pan with this mixture.
3. Mix walnuts, chocolate chips and coconut; spread over crust.
4. Pour condensed milk over the top and bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes.

Voici une recette de Scalloped Apples :

- 1/4 c. firmly packed brown sugar
- 1/2 c. flour
- 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
- 1/2 tsp. salt

Étapes de préparation :

2. Add 2 teaspoons of lemon juice to 1/2 cup water and pour over all. Cover and bake 30 minutes at 350°.

Voici une recette de Strawberry Bread :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 3 c. flour
- 1 tsp. salt
- 4 eggs
- 2 c. sugar
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries
- 1 1/4 c. vegetable oil
- 3 oz. cream cheese, softened
- 1 c. sifted confectioners sugar
- 1/4 tsp. vanilla
- 1 tsp. soda
- 1 Tbsp. cinnamon
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans

Étapes de préparation :
1. Preheat oven to 350°.
2. Combine flour, salt, eggs, sugar, strawberries, oil, soda, cinnamon and pecans in bowl; mix well. Pour into 2 greased 5 x 9-inch loaf pans.
3. Bake for 1 hour. Remove to wire rack to cool.
4. Cut into thin slices.
5. Combine cream cheese, confectioners sugar and vanilla in bowl.
6. Beat until smooth.
7. Spread between slices of strawberry bread.
8. Yield:
9. 30 servings.

Voici une recette de Homemade Granola :

- 4 c. uncooked oatmeal (quick type)
- 1 c. chopped peanuts (no skins)

- 1/2 c. bran (unprocessed, uncooked)
- sugar substitute to equal 1/4 c. sugar
- 1/3 c. vegetable oil

Étapes de préparation :

4. Allow mixture to cook in the oven.

response:
Voici une recette de Potato Tuna Chowder :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 6 medium potatoes, peeled and sliced
- 2 medium carrots, peeled and diced
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 1 can tuna, drained
- 4 c. milk
- salt and pepper to taste
- minced parsley

Étapes de préparation :
1. Melt butter in large saucepan.
2. Saute onion until transparent. Add potatoes, carrots, celery and 2 cups water.
3. Bring to a boil.
4. Cover and simmer 25 to 30 minutes or until vegetables are tender, stirring constantly.
5. Add tuna and milk.
6. Heat through. Season to taste and serve sprinkled with parsley.

Serves 8.

response:
Voici une recette de Cream Puffs :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1/2 c. bread flour, sifted before measuring
- 1/2 c. milk or water
- 1/4 c. butter
- 1/8 tsp. salt
- 2 eggs

Étapes de préparation :
1. Heat the milk or water.
2. Add the butter.
3. Bring these ingredients to the boiling point.
4. Add the sifted flour and salt. Cook and stir the batter until it leaves the sides of the pan and forms a ball.
5. Remove it from the heat.
6. Beat in the eggs, one at a time.
7. Be careful to beat 1 egg until well blended before adding the other.
8. Important!
9. Place spoonfuls of batter into 2-inch rounds on a greased tin.
10. Allow 2 inches between the puffs.
11. Bake in a 400° oven for 1/2 hour. When the puffs are cool, cut a gash in the side of each and fill with whipped cream, custard or chicken salad.

- 1/4 c. butter or margarine
- 1/4 c. milk
- 3/4 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 2 large eggs, lightly beaten
- 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
- paprika

2. Drain and mash.
3. Stir in butter and next 3 ingredients. Let cool 10 minutes.
4. Stir in eggs.
5. Spoon mixture into a large decorating bag fitted with a large star tip.
6. Pipe 14 (2-inch) rosettes onto a lightly greased baking sheet.
7. Drizzle with melted butter and sprinkle with paprika.
8. Bake at 350° for 15 minutes or until lightly browned around the edges.

- 2 tsp. vanilla

- 1 tsp. salt
- 5 c. flour

Étapes de préparation :
1. Cream together butter, sugar and eggs. Mix sour cream and soda together in bowl and let stand until foamy. Add the rest of the ingredients to the above mixtures and mix well. Place into 4 greased and floured 9 x 5-inch bread pans or into 12 prepared mini loaf pans. Sprinkle lightly with sugar just before baking. Bake at 350° for 50 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Note: You may add 1 cup of chopped nuts to the batter if you wish. You may also use Egg Beaters, low-fat sour cream and margarine. This is a very moist bread recipe which makes a lot and freezes well.

Étapes de préparation :

Voici une recette de Kahlua Cheesecake :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- Zwieback Crust
- 2 envelopes unflavored gelatin
- 1/2 c. Kahlua
- 1/2 c. water
- 3 eggs, separated
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1/8 tsp. salt
- 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 c. whipping cream
- shaved or curled chocolate

Étapes de préparation :
1. Prepare Zwieback Crust.
2. In top of double boiler, soften gelatin in Kahlua and water.
3. Beat in egg yolks, sugar and salt. Cook over boiling water, stirring constantly, until slightly thickened.
4. Beat cheese until fluffy.
5. Gradually beat in Kahlua mixture; cool.
6. Beat egg whites until stiff, but not dry.
7. Beat cream stiff.
8. Fold egg whites and cream into cheese mixture.
9. Pour into prepared pan.
10. Chill 4 or 5 hours or overnight.
11. Remove from refrigerator 15 minutes before serving.
12. Decorate with shaved or curled chocolate.
13. Makes 12 servings.

- 3 c. sugar
- 1 c. sugar (to brown)
- 1 can cream
- 1 stick butter
- 3 or 4 c. pecans
- 1 Tbsp. vanilla

Étapes de préparation :
1. On medium-low fire, add cream to 3 cups sugar and dissolve. Bring to 234° (soft ball).
2. While cooking sugar and cream, burn 1 cup sugar on medium-low. Sugar should turn to liquid crystal about the same time the other pot reaches 234° (soft ball).
3. Combine crystal sugar to large pot by pouring slowly.
4. Mixture will rise high, then simmer down.
5. It should be 234° or soft ball.
6. Remove from fire.
7. After stirring good, add butter, vanilla and pecans. Set aside for 8 to 10 minutes, stirring several times to cool and it gets dull.
8. Spoon on waxed paper.

Voici une recette de "Yummy" Strawberry Pie :

- 1/4 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. hot water
- 9-inch single crust baked pie shell
- 3 c. whipped topping
- 1 1/2 c. sliced fresh strawberries or 12 oz. pkg. frozen strawberries

Étapes de préparation :
1. Mix the strawberry gelatin with sugar in a small bowl.
2. Heat 3/4 cup water in a saucepan until water is very hot.
3. Pour the water over gelatin and sugar.
4. Stir the gelatin with a spoon to dissolve it.
5. Put the bowl in refrigerator about 20 minutes, so that gelatin will thicken, but not "set."
6. Fold 3 cups of topping and gelatin together.
7. Mix the strawberries into the pie filling (gelatin mixture) with a spoon.
8. Pour into a cooled baked pie crust.
9. Put in refrigerator.
10. Chill 1 to 2 hours.

Voici une recette de Queen'S Pralines :

- 2 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. milk
- pinch of soda
- 1/3 stick margarine
- 1 tsp. vanilla
- 2 c. pecans

Étapes de préparation :
1. In heavy skillet over medium heat, cook kitchen spoon of sugar until carmelized and medium brown color.
2. In large saucepan, cook 2 cups sugar and milk until it boils; remove from heat and add soda.
3. Stir thoroughly (mixture will be frothy).
4. Return to heat and again bring to rolling boil.
5. Remove from heat and stir in carmelized sugar; stir well.
6. Return to heat and cook to soft ball stage, stirring frequently.
7. Then add margarine, vanilla and pecans.
8. Stir until mixture starts to harden and loses its gloss. Drop by spoonful onto waxed paper.
9. (I place pan in cold water to speed hardening.)
10. Makes 18 to 24 pralines depending on size desired.

Voici une recette de Gram'S Irish Soda Bread :

Étapes de préparation :

Voici une recette de Baked Cinnamon Twists Or Crullers :

- 1 c. dairy sour cream
- 2 1/2 to 3 c. sifted flour
- 1/4 c. warm water
- 3 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 egg, beaten

Étapes de préparation :
1. Dissolve yeast in water. Let stand for 5 minutes.
2. Meanwhile, place sour cream in saucepan and place on medium heat.
3. Put margarine in sour cream and stir until margarine melts.
4. Remove from heat and let cool to lukewarm.
5. Add the sugar, salt, soda and egg.
6. Beat well.
7. Add yeast mix.
8. Then add flour gradually to make soft dough.
9. Turn out on floured board.
10. Knead until smooth and elastic.
11. Place in a greased bowl and turn over.
12. Cover.
13. Let rise in warm place until doubled in bulk.
14. Turn out on floured board and roll to 12 x 24-inch rectangle.

Étapes de préparation :

- 20 to 25 tiny pearl onions
- 4 cloves garlic, crushed
- 1 bay leaf
- parsley stems
- sprigs of fresh thyme
- salt and black pepper

Étapes de préparation :
1. Preheat oven to 375°.
2. Blanch bacon in boiling water 3 minutes.
3. Drain, refresh and pat dry.
4. Peel potatoes and blanch for 5 minutes; drain and pat dry.
5. Trim fat from chicken and season.
6. Add butter and oil to large covered casserole and brown chicken over high heat.
7. Remove and set aside.
8. Add bacon to pot and brown; remove.
9. Brown pearl onions; remove.
10. Brown blanched potatoes and remove.
11. Pour off excess fat.
12. Return chicken to casserole.
13. Add bacon, vegetables, garlic and herbs.
14. Pour in 1/2 cup water; season with salt and pepper.
15. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes, half of the time covered.

Serves 6.

Voici une recette de Sauerbraten :

- 2 tsp. salt
- 12 peppercorns
- 3 whole cloves
- 3 bay leaves
- 1 lemon, rinsed and cut into 1-inch slices
- 3 Tbsp. butter

Étapes de préparation :
1. Wipe a 4 pound pot roast with a clean, damp cloth.
2. Combine next 7 ingredients in a saucepan.
3. Heat without boiling.
4. Pour hot mixture over meat and allow to cool.
5. Add 1 lemon, rinsed and cut into 1-inch slices.
6. Cover and set in refrigerator, turning meat over each day (3 to 4 days).
7. Remove meat from marinade.
8. Heat 3 tablespoons butter in pan.
9. Add pot roast and brown slowly.
10. Add 1 1/2 to 2 cups of marinade; bring to boiling.
11. Reduce heat, cover tightly and simmer 2 1/2 to 3 hours.
12. Add more liquid when needed. Only simmer, never boil.

- 1 lb. 4x4 Swiss cheese, sliced

Étapes de préparation :
1. Mix butter, mustard, onion and poppy seeds. Cut the crust from the loaf - DO NOT remove the bottom crust. Slice 3/4 of the way through the loaf every 1 to 1 1/2 inches. "Paint" the entire loaf with the mustard mixture (between the slices also-not the bottom). Fold one or two slices of cheese and place between each bread slice across the loaf. Top each slice of bread with a slice of partially cooked bacon. Bake in a 350 degree oven of 15 minutes. The cheese should appear "melty". Place the loaf under the broiler to brown the bacon, watching closely so it doesn't burn. Slice and serve with your favorite soup.

Voici une recette de Soofganiya (Jelly Doughnut) :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 4 1/2 c. flour
- 1 tsp. baking powder
- 1 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. cinnamon
- 1/4 tsp. nutmeg
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 1/4 c. oil
- 1 c. fruit juice
- powdered sugar
- jelly for filling
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 3/8 c. flour
- 1 7/8 c. milk
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. instant coffee
- 1 c. butter
- 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract

Étapes de préparation :
1. Mix the flour and sugar while adding the milk gradually. Pour into double boiler. Cook over high heat. Stir until mixture is texture of wall paper paste.
2. Add coffee, cover and chill.
3. Soften butter to room temperature. Whip it. Add cold, stiff mocha cream gradually. Add vanilla.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poivrons et haricots, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits à coque ni de oeufs
response:
Voici une recette de Squash Casserole :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 3 lb. squash
- 3 onions
- 1 pt. sour cream
- 3 carrots, grated
- 2 cans chicken or mushroom soup
- 1 pkg. Pepperidge Farm stuffing mix
- 1 stick butter
- salt and pepper to taste

Étapes de préparation :
1. Cook squash, onions and carrots until tender.
2. Mash.
3. Melt butter in pan; stir in stuffing until all is coated.
4. Drain all water from squash.
5. Stir in sour cream and soup.
6. Place in a greased baking dish a layer of squash and a layer of stuffing. Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.

Étapes de préparation :
1. Mix all ingredients together well.
2. Chill several hours before serving.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec tomates et boeuf, elle ne doit pas contenir de moutarde ni de fruits de mer
response:
Voici une recette de Italian Frosting :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 c. milk
- 3 heaping Tbsp. flour
- 1 c. butter, softened
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. vanilla

Étapes de préparation :
1. Blend milk and flour.
2. Cook to a thick paste in a small saucepan over medium heat, stirring constantly, until all mixture leaves sides of pan and forms a ball on the spoon.
3. Cool.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poulet et lentilles, elle ne doit pas contenir de lactose
response:
Voici une recette de Garden Patch Soup :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
- 1 (16 oz.) can whole kernel corn
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen lima beans, cooked and drained
- 2 (13 1/2 oz.) cans chicken broth
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 3 1/2 c. tomato juice
- 1 c. cooked and diced chicken or turkey
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 Tbsp. margarine
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce

Étapes de préparation :
1. Combine all ingredients in a 5-quart Dutch oven. Bring to boiling over medium heat.
2. Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stir occasionally.
3. Makes 6 servings.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec lentilles, poisson et boeuf, elle ne doit pas contenir de cacahuètes
response:
Voici une recette de Railroad Pie :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 1/4 lb. ground beef
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1 (11 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained
- 1 (14 oz.) can Mexican-style stewed tomatoes
- 1 Tbsp. chili powder
- dash of black pepper
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- 1 (8 oz.) container sour cream
- 1 tsp. salt

Étapes de préparation :
1. Brown ground beef and onion in skillet; drain well.
2. Combine remaining filling ingredients with meat mixture and pour into a 2-quart greased casserole.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poulet et poisson, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits de mer ni de cacahuètes
response:
Voici une recette de Welsh Rarebit :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 tsp. oleo
- 2 slices cheese, diced
- pinch of salt
- pinch of dry mustard
- pinch of cayenne pepper
- 1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1/4 c. milk
- 1 egg, slightly beaten
- 1/2 tsp. flour

Étapes de préparation :
1. In top of double boiler, melt oleo and cheese. When smooth, stir in salt, mustard, cayenne pepper and Worcestershire sauce. Slowly stir in milk. When smooth and hot, turn off heat. Quickly stir in beaten egg and flour. Serve immediately over toast.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec haricots et poisson, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits à coque ni de gluten
response:
Voici une recette de Buns :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 c. olive oil
- 1 Tbsp. salt
- 6 c. warm water
- 1 c. white sugar
- 1 cake yeast or 3 dry fast rising
- 5 lb. Robin Hood flour, sift

Étapes de préparation :
1. Dissolve yeast in warm water.
2. Add rest of ingredients to yeast.
3. Add flour 1 cup at a time. Put in greased bowl and let raise until double. Punch down, make buns and let raise again on tray.
4. Bake at 350° for 15 minutes or until nice and brown.
5. Makes 5 dozen buns.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec pâtes et riz, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits de mer ni de oeufs
response:
Voici une recette de Double Bean Casserole :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- 1 can cream of celery soup
- 1 (16 oz.) can bean sprouts, drained
- 1 (18 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
- 1 (16 oz.) can French-style green beans, drained
- 1 (3 oz.) can French fried onion rings
- dash of soy sauce

Étapes de préparation :
1. Combine soups.
2. Pour 1/2 into greased 2-quart casserole. Layer bean sprouts, water chestnuts and then green beans.
3. Add remaining soup.
4. Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.
5. Top with onion rings and return to oven for 5 more minutes.

Serves 6.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec boeuf, tomates et lentilles, elle ne doit pas contenir de cacahuètes ni de fruits à coque
response:
Voici une recette de Quick Chocolate Chip Cookie Bars :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1/4 c. brown sugar
- 1/4 c. vegetable oil
- 1/2 tsp. vanilla
- 1 egg
- 1 c. all-purpose flour
- 1/4 tsp. baking soda
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/2 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips

Étapes de préparation :
1. Preheat oven to 375°.
2. Mix sugars, oil, vanilla and egg in a bowl with a spoon until smooth.
3. Stir in flour, salt and baking soda.
4. Spread dough into a greased square or round (8 or 9-inch) cake pan.
5. Sprinkle with chips.
6. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes.
7. Cool. Cut into squares or wedges.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec tomates et pommes de terre, elle ne doit pas contenir de soja ni de moutarde

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec carottes, boeuf et oignons, elle ne doit pas contenir de soja ni de sésame
response:
Voici une recette de Bran Muffins :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 c. sugar
- 5 Tbsp. baking soda
- 1 c. oil
- 5 c. flour
- 5 eggs
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1 qt. buttermilk
- 1 (16 oz.) box Kellogg's Raisin Bran cereal

Étapes de préparation :
1. Beat together sugar, eggs and oil.
2. Then add and beat in salt, soda and flour, alternately with buttermilk.
3. Then add and gently beat in Kellogg's Raisin Bran.
4. (This will keep in the refrigerator for a week.)
5. Fill nearly full greased muffin tins. bake at 380° for 20 minutes.
6. Makes 3 1/2 dozen average size muffins.
7. (If you can keep them, they go quickly.
8. Freeze excellent.
9. This is one of the best recipes I've ever made.
10. Got it from "Friday Feast" Channel 7.)

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec ail, pâtes et poulet, elle ne doit pas contenir de moutarde
response:
Voici une recette de Mexican Corn Bread :

- 1 1/2 c. corn meal

- 3 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. soda
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 c. buttermilk
- 1 small can creamed corn
- 3 to 6 chopped jalapeno peppers
- 1/2 green pepper, chopped

Étapes de préparation :

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec ail, pommes de terre et poulet, elle ne doit pas contenir de gluten ni de oeufs
response:
Voici une recette de Sausage Cheese Balls :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 pkg. uncooked Jimmy Dean Fresh sausage
- 16 oz. sharp cheddar cheese
- 1 1/2 c. all purpose baking biscuit mix
- 1/2 c. finely chopped celery

Étapes de préparation :
1. Preheat oven to 375°. Shred cheese and mix all ingredients. Form into one inch balls. Bake 15 minutes on ungreased baking sheet until golden brown. Makes 6 dozen. Sausage cheese balls can be frozen uncooked.
2. For a firmer texture add an extra 3 cups of baking biscuit mix and an extra 2 cups of shredded cheese to the ingredients listed above.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec ail et pâtes, elle ne doit pas contenir de sésame
response:
Voici une recette de Cheese Sauce :

- 3/4 lb. Velveeta cheese

Étapes de préparation :
1. Microwave cheese and milk 4 to 6 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes.
2. Serve over baked potatoes or vegetables.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec riz, pommes de terre et poisson, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits à coque ni de moutarde
response:
Voici une recette de Cinnamon Snaps :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1/2 c. butter, softened (1 stick)
- 3/4 c. plus 3 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 egg
- 1 tsp. vanilla extract
- 1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
- 1/2 tsp. baking soda
- 1/2 tsp. baking powder
- 1/4 tsp. salt (optional)
- 2 tsp. ground cinnamon

Étapes de préparation :
1. Heat oven to 375°.
2. Beat butter and 3/4 cup sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Beat in egg and extract.
4. Combine flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt.
5. Gradually add to butter mixture, mixing well.
6. Combine cinnamon and remaining 3 tablespoons sugar in small bowl.
7. Roll dough into 1-inch balls and roll in sugar/cinnamon mixture.
8. Place 2 inches apart on lightly buttered cookie sheet. Bake 11 to 12 minutes or until light golden brown.
9. Let stand on cookie sheet.
10. Transfer to wire cooling racks.
11. Makes about 2 dozen cookies.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poivrons, tomates et poulet, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits de mer
response:
Voici une recette de Pannakochan :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 stick margarine
- 1 1/2 c. flour
- 1 1/2 c. milk
- 6 eggs
- 1 can pie filling (optional)

Étapes de préparation :
1. Melt margarine in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
2. Mix milk, flour and eggs until smooth.
3. Pour into pan over melted margarine.
4. Spoon pie filling over batter.
5. Bake 40 to 45 minutes at 400°.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec carottes et lentilles, elle ne doit pas contenir de oeufs ni de soja
response:
Voici une recette de No-Mix Cherry-Pineapple Nut Cake :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple (in heavy syrup)
- 1 (21 oz.) can cherry pie filling
- 1 pkg. yellow cake mix for 2 layer cake
- 1 (3 oz.) can pecans (1 c.), chopped
- 1/2 c. margarine or butter (1 stick)

Étapes de préparation :
1. About 1 1/4 hours before serving, preheat oven to 350°. Grease a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
2. Spread pineapple with its heavy syrup evenly in dish.
3. Spoon cherry next.
4. Sprinkle dry cake mix, then pecans over fruit.
5. Cut margarine into thin slices.
6. Place over all ingredients in pan.
7. Bake at 350° for
8. 50 minutes or until golden.
9. Serve warm.
10. Yields 12 servings.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poulet, riz et ail, elle ne doit pas contenir de soja

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec oignons et tomates, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits à coque ni de sésame
response:
Voici une recette de Ladyfingers :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 1/2 stick butter
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 4 tsp. vanilla
- 1 c. nuts
- 2 c. plain flour
- dash of salt

Étapes de préparation :
1. Cream softened butter and sugar until smooth.
2. Add vanilla, nuts, salt and flour.
3. Roll by hand into small rolls.
4. Place on greased cookie sheet and bake 30 minutes at 325° or until brown. Cool slightly and place in a bag of powdered sugar and shake to coat.
5. Dry on waxed paper.
6. Store in airtight container.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poivrons, poulet et pâtes, elle ne doit pas contenir de cacahuètes ni de oeufs
response:
Voici une recette de Linda'S Sweet Potato Pie :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 Tbsp. cinnamon
- 1 tsp. nutmeg
- 1/2 tsp. ginger
- 2 eggs, slightly beaten
- 2 cans sweet potatoes, drained
- 1 can evaporated milk
- 1 tsp. allspice
- 2 unbaked pie pastries

Étapes de préparation :
1. Combine dry ingredients; add to mashed sweet potatoes.
2. Mix milk, eggs and add to potatoes.
3. Stir until mixed well, but leave some lumps of potatoes.
4. Pour filling into 2 pie shells; dot with margarine.
5. Bake at 450° for 10 minutes; reduce heat to 350° and bake 35 minutes.
6. Yields two 9-inch pies.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec carottes et riz, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits de mer
response:
Voici une recette de Chocolate Bread Pudding :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 10 cold biscuits
- 4 c. milk
- 3 eggs, beaten
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. cocoa
- 1/2 c. flour
- 2 tsp. vanilla

Étapes de préparation :
1. Crumb biscuits in large mixing bowl.
2. Pour milk over crumbs and let set for 1 hour.
3. Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Pour in 12 x 13-inch slightly greased baking dish.
4. Bake at 325° for 45 minutes or until well done.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poisson, oignons et lentilles, elle ne doit pas contenir de sésame ni de oeufs
response:
Voici une recette de Red Raspberry Cordial :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 4 c. raspberries
- 4 c. sugar
- 2 c. gin or vodka

Étapes de préparation :
1. In a 1-gallon jar fitted with a lid, combine the raspberries, sugar and the gin.
2. Stir the mixture well.
3. Secure the lid.
4. Let mixture stand, stirring it once a week, for 4 months.
5. Strain the mixture through a cheesecloth lined sieve into a pitcher, pressing hard on the solids.
6. Return it to the jar.
7. Makes about 4 cups.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec lentilles et boeuf, elle ne doit pas contenir de oeufs
response:
Voici une recette de Banana Split Cake :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 c. graham cracker crumbs
- 5 Tbsp. melted butter
- 2 c. powdered sugar
- 1 tsp. vanilla
- 2 eggs
- bananas
- 1 stick butter
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple
- 10 oz. Cool Whip
- chopped nuts

Étapes de préparation :
1. Mix crumbs and melted butter in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
2. Beat powdered sugar, vanilla and stick of butter together for 10 minutes.
3. Add eggs and continue to beat until it looks like pudding.
4. Spread over crumb layer, peel bananas and slice over cream mixture; drain all juice from pineapple and put over bananas.
5. Cover with Cool Whip and sprinkle nuts.
6. Chill for 4 hours.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec haricots, poisson et poivrons, elle ne doit pas contenir de sésame ni de oeufs

- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- 1/3 can water

Étapes de préparation :

3. Top with crushed cornflakes.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poulet, boeuf et poivrons, elle ne doit pas contenir de moutarde ni de gluten

Voici une recette de Strawberry Salad :

- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries
- 1 (13 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 2 large ripe bananas, finely diced

Étapes de préparation :
1. Dissolve jello in boiling water.
2. Add frozen strawberries; stir occasionally until thawed.
3. Add pineapple and diced bananas. Pour half into an 8 x 8 x 2-inch pan.
4. Chill firm.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec haricots, poivrons et oignons, elle ne doit pas contenir de moutarde ni de fruits à coque
response:
Voici une recette de Mediterranean Cucumber Salad :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 small firm cucumbers
- 1 c. plain yogurt
- 3 Tbsp. raisins
- 1/4 c. chopped walnuts
- 1 small onion, finely chopped
- salt and pepper to taste

Étapes de préparation :
1. Peel cucumbers.
2. Slice lengthwise.
3. Remove and discard seeds. Dice cucumbers and place in bowl.
4. Add remaining ingredients and mix well.
5. Chill and serve very cold.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec pâtes et oignons, elle ne doit pas contenir de moutarde
response:
Voici une recette de Banana Nut Bread :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1/3 c. shortening
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 2 eggs
- 1 3/4 c. sifted all-purpose flour
- 1 tsp. baking powder
- 1/2 tsp. soda
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 c. mashed ripe banana (about 2)
- 1/2 c. nuts

Étapes de préparation :
1. Cream shortening and sugar; add eggs and beat well.
2. Add dry ingredients alternately with banana, blending well after each addition.
3. Stir in nuts.
4. Pour into well greased 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan.
5. Bake at 350° for 45 to 50 minutes until done.
6. Remove from pan; cool on rack.
7. Wrap and store overnight.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec carottes et boeuf, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits de mer ni de fruits à coque
response:
Voici une recette de Chocolate Mousse :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 12 oz. Nestle semi-sweet chocolate morsels
- 6 Tbsp. cold water
- 4 Tbsp. sugar
- 6 eggs, separated
- 1 1/2 pt. heavy cream
- 2 tsp. vanilla
- 2 pkg. ladyfingers (unfilled type)
- sprinkling of chocolate sprinkles
- 2 Tbsp. sugar

Étapes de préparation :
1. Make one day in advance!
2. Line bottom of spring-form pan with wax paper (trace pan bottom onto wax paper; cut and fit into pan bottom).
3. Melt chocolate morsels and 6 tablespoons water in double boiler.
4. Add sugar.
5. Remove from heat.
6. Add 6 egg yolks.
7. Beat egg whites until stiff.
8. Fold into chocolate mixture.
9. (Do in large bowl.)
10. Beat 1 pint heavy cream, adding vanilla.
11. Fold into chocolate mixture.
12. Line bottom and sides of pan with ladyfingers (there will be a couple of leftover ones) to form picket fence. Chill overnight.
13. Two hours before serving, beat 1/2 pint heavy cream with 2 tablespoons sugar.
14. Pour over mousse, then sprinkle with chocolate sprinkles immediately before serving.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec boeuf, pâtes et pommes de terre, elle ne doit pas contenir de gluten

- 2 oz. chocolate
- 1/2 c. flour
- 1 tsp. vanilla
- 2 egg whites

Étapes de préparation :
1. Cream butter until soft and gradually add sugar.
2. Blend until creamy.
3. Beat in the egg yolks.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec riz et poisson, elle ne doit pas contenir de gluten

Voici une recette de Chippewa Soup :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 qt. carrots, diced
- 2 qt. onions, chopped
- 1 qt. celery, diced
- 1 lb. green split peas
- 2 qt. tomato puree
- 6 cloves garlic
- 1 gal. of water
- 10 oz. smoked ham
- 2 potatoes, diced
- 1 oz. marjoram
- 1 oz. basil
- 1 oz. oregano
- 1 oz. thyme
- 4 bay leaves
- 4 oz. curry powder (we use Javin Brand)
- Salt and pepper

Étapes de préparation :
1. Soak the split peas overnight.
2. In a large pot (preferably 3-4 gallons) heat a small amount of oil until very hot.
3. Add the carrots, onions and celery and sweat the vegetables.
4. Add the garlic and sweat a few more minutes.
5. Add the curry powder to the vegetables and stir until curry is thoroughly mixed with the vegetables.
6. Add all remaining ingredients to the pot.
7. Bring this to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for approximately three hours. Adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper.
8. Remove the bay leaves and puree the soup through a food mill or in an electric blender. Chill thoroughly.
9. This is the base for Chippewa Soup.
10. It should be slightly salty because it is the base and needs to be creamed before use.

Voici une recette de Peanut Butter Pie :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 c. light or dark corn syrup
- 1 c. sugar
- 3 eggs, slightly beaten
- 1/2 tsp. vanilla
- 1/3 c. creamy or chunk style peanut butter
- 1 unbaked 9-inch pastry shell

Étapes de préparation :
1. Blend corn syrup, sugar, eggs, vanilla and peanut butter in a bowl.
2. Pour into unbaked pie shell.
3. Bake in hot oven (400°) for 15 minutes.
4. Reduce heat to 350° and bake 30 to 35 minutes longer.

- 1 c. homemade syrup or molasses
- 1 tsp. soda
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 2 1/2 c. self-rising flour
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 egg
- 1 tsp. ginger
- 1 tsp. cinnamon

Étapes de préparation :
1. Mix all these ingredients together and bake in a long pan at 350°.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poisson, lentilles et riz, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits à coque
response:
Voici une recette de Coconut Caramels :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. light corn syrup
- 1 1/2 c. half and half, divided
- 1 (3 1/2 oz.) can coconut
- 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
- 1 Tbsp. vanilla extract

Étapes de préparation :
1. Combine sugar, corn syrup and 1/2 cup half and half in a heavy saucepan.
2. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture reaches soft ball stage (230° on candy thermometer).
3. Add 1/2 cup half and half; cook, stirring constantly, until mixture reaches soft ball stage again.
4. Add remaining half and half; cook, stirring constantly, until mixture again reaches the soft ball stage.
5. Remove mixture from heat; add coconut, butter and vanilla. Stir until butter is melted.
6. Pour into a greased 8 x 4 x 2 5/8-inch loaf pan; let stand until cool.
7. Turn candy out onto a marble slab or waxed paper.
8. Cut into 1-inch squares.
9. Let stand overnight.
10. Wrap individually in plastic wrap.
11. Yield:
12. About 32 (1-inch) pieces.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec carottes, ail et pommes de terre, elle ne doit pas contenir de oeufs
response:
Voici une recette de Blueberry Cream Pie :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 c. sour cream
- 2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. vanilla
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1 egg, beaten
- 2 1/2 c. fresh blueberries
- 1 unbaked pie shell
- 3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
- 3 Tbsp. pecans or walnuts, chopped

Étapes de préparation :
1. Combine sour cream, 2 tablespoons flour, sugar, vanilla, salt and egg.
2. Beat 5 minutes at medium speed of electric mixer; fold in blueberries.
3. Pour into pie shell.
4. Bake at 375° for 25 minutes.
5. Remove from oven.
6. Combine remaining flour, butter and nuts.
7. Sprinkle over top of pie and bake an additional 10 minutes. Chill before serving.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec boeuf, oignons et poulet, elle ne doit pas contenir de gluten ni de lactose

- 2 lb. ground chuck
- 2 Tbsp. soy sauce
- 1/3 c. catsup

- 1/3 c. parsley flakes
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice

- 1/2 tsp. garlic salt

- 2 Tbsp. minced onion
- 1 tsp. pepper
- 12 oz. chili sauce
- 2 Tbsp. brown sugar

Étapes de préparation :
1. Combine ground chuck, soy sauce, catsup, corn flakes, parsley flakes, garlic salt, eggs, onion and pepper.
2. Mix well and form into balls.
3. Place balls into baking dish.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec ail, poulet et carottes, elle ne doit pas contenir de sésame ni de lactose
response:
Voici une recette de Chocolate Pie :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 eggs, separated
- 2 c. sweet milk
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. cornstarch
- 1 Tbsp. butter
- 1 Tbsp. flour
- 2 Tbsp. cocoa
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. vanilla

Étapes de préparation :
1. Beat egg yolks and add milk. Sift all dry ingredients together. Add to milk and eggs. Cook in double boiler until thick. Or----Put in qt. size dish and cook in microwave for 3 minutes on high, take out and stir. Cook 1 minute and stir until thick. Add vanilla and butter. Put in baked pie shell and set aside.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poivrons et pâtes, elle ne doit pas contenir de oeufs ni de lactose
response:
Voici une recette de Mexican Casserole :

- Fritos or Doritos
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1 onion
- 1 can rotel

Voici une recette de Refrigerator Rolls :

- 2 eggs
- about 16 c. plain flour
- 2 c. water (more or less)

- 2 c. milk

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poisson, poivrons et riz, elle ne doit pas contenir de soja ni de cacahuètes
response:
Voici une recette de Scalloped Potatoes :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 6 c. frozen hash brown potatoes
- 2 cans cream of chicken soup
- 1 c. sour cream
- 2 Tbsp. chopped chives
- 2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese

Étapes de préparation :
1. Lightly grease a 9 x 13-inch pan.
2. Mix soup, sour cream and chives together.
3. Layer in pan the potatoes, soup mixture and cheese.
4. Repeat, ending with grated cheese on top.
5. Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec ail et tomates, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits à coque ni de oeufs
response:
Voici une recette de Salmon Patties For Two :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 (7 3/4 oz.) can salmon
- 8 soda crackers, crumbled
- 1 egg
- 1 Tbsp. onion, grated
- 1 Tbsp. parsley
- 1/4 to 1 tsp. dry mustard
- salt
- celery, chopped
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice

Étapes de préparation :
1. Drain salmon, reserving liquid.
2. Flake and clean salmon and blend it with the reserved liquid and the remaining ingredients. Add more crackers or another egg if the consistency will not make firm patties.
3. After you make the patties, fry them in a skillet. Fry with 2 or 3 tablespoons melted butter.
4. Brown on both sides. Serve with sliced lemon wedges.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec riz, tomates et pâtes, elle ne doit pas contenir de gluten
response:
Voici une recette de Sherried Beef :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 3 lb. chuck cubes
- 1/2 envelope onion soup mix
- 2 cans cream of celery soup
- 3/4 can sherry (dry)

Étapes de préparation :
1. Mix the onion soup mix, celery soup and sherry; pour over meat in large casserole or roasting pan.
2. Cover; bake at 325° for 3 hours.
3. Stir occasionally.
4. Add water if needed.
5. Quick and easy!!

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poivrons, oignons et pâtes, elle ne doit pas contenir de soja
response:
Voici une recette de Dressing For Fruit Salad :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 eggs
- 1 stick margarine
- 1/2 c. pineapple juice
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1 c. sugar
- 4 tsp. flour
- 1/2 pt. whipping cream

Étapes de préparation :
1. Beat eggs in boiler.
2. Add sugar, salt, margarine, fruit juice and flour.
3. Cook until thick, stirring constantly; when ready to serve, whip the cream and stir into mixture.
4. Use over mixed fruit.
5. This makes a quart and will keep a week in the refrigerator.
6. Can also be used as a dip for fruit.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poulet, lentilles et pommes de terre, elle ne doit pas contenir de cacahuètes

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poulet et poisson, elle ne doit pas contenir de oeufs

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec lentilles et ail, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits de mer ni de lactose
response:
Voici une recette de Potato Soup :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 large carrots, shredded
- 1 large parsley, shredded
- 1 small leek, shredded
- 0.5 lb. celery root, shredded
- 1.5 lb. potatoes, shredded
- 2 beef broth cubes, dissolved in 5 c. water
- 1 yolk
- 3/4 c. heavy cream
- pepper, salt, bay leaf, allspice and nutmeg

Étapes de préparation :
1. Saute vegetables until transparent (not brown!).
2. Pour prepared beef broth over vegetables.
3. Add 1 bay leaf, 2 to 3 grains allspice and salt and pepper to taste.
4. Cook on medium heat until tender (about 0.5 hour).
5. Drain, setting liquid aside. (Remove bay leaf and allspice.)
6. Puree vegetables and combine with liquid until it has consistency of cream (do not need to use all; usually there is more liquid than needed).
7. If you want to freeze, do it now.

Voici une recette de No Peek Chicken :

- 1 can cream of celery soup

8. Don't peek!

Voici une recette de Mostaccioli Con Formaggio(Baked Macaroni And Cheese) :

5. Cover and cook about 20 minutes.

Étapes de préparation :

Voici une recette de Super Cheese Soup :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1/2 c. coarsely chopped carrots
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 3/4 c. boiling water
- 1/4 c. chopped onion
- 3 Tbsp. margarine
- 1/4 c. flour
- 2 c. milk
- 1 (13 1/2 oz.) can chicken broth

Étapes de préparation :

2. Cook onion in margarine until just tender.
3. Stir in flour. Gradually add milk.
4. Cook and stir until thick.
5. Add broth, cheese and vegetables.
6. Stir over low heat until cheese melts. Makes 6 servings.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec riz, pâtes et poivrons, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits à coque
response:
Voici une recette de Brownie Pie :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
- 1/4 c. cocoa
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 eggs
- 1/2 c. margarine at room temperature
- 1/8 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. vanilla
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts
- ice cream or whipped cream

Étapes de préparation :
1. Place flour, cocoa and sugar in a large mixing bowl.
2. Stir to mix well.
3. Add eggs, margarine, salt and vanilla.
4. Beat with a whisk for about 4 minutes.
5. Stir in nuts.
6. Pour into a greased 8-inch pie pan and bake in preheated 325° oven until done, about 30 to 40 minutes.
7. Pie will puff up and then settle down.
8. Serve slightly warm with ice cream or whipped cream.
9. Makes 8 servings.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec ail et lentilles, elle ne doit pas contenir de gluten ni de moutarde
response:
Voici une recette de Pumpkin Cookies :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 c. brown sugar
- 2 c. cooked or canned pumpkin
- 1 c. salad oil
- 2 tsp. vanilla
- 4 c. sifted flour
- 2 tsp. soda
- 2 tsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. each: salt, cinnamon and nutmeg
- 1/2 tsp. ginger
- 2 c. raisins
- 1 c. chopped nuts

Étapes de préparation :
1. In mixing bowl, beat together the sugar, pumpkin, oil and vanilla.
2. Sift together the dry ingredients.
3. Add raisins and nuts.
4. Blend both mixtures together.
5. Drop by spoonfuls onto oiled baking sheet.
6. Bake at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poulet et riz, elle ne doit pas contenir de moutarde
response:
Voici une recette de Coffee Can Bread :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1/2 c. warm water
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/8 tsp. ginger
- 1 pkg. yeast
- 1 large can evaporated milk
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. oil
- 1 tsp. salt
- 4 to 4 1/2 c. flour

Étapes de préparation :
1. Mix warm water, 1 tablespoon sugar, ginger and yeast; let stand 15 minutes.
2. Add evaporated milk, 2 tablespoons sugar, oil and salt.
3. Next, beat flour in one cup at a time.
4. When too stiff to stir, work all of the flour in with hands.
5. Lay on countertop and divide the dough in 2 pieces.
6. Shape and put into 2 (1 pound) coffee cans that have been greased well.
7. Let rise until 1 1/2 to 2-inches above top of cans.
8. Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.
9. Remove from cans and cool.

10. Add drained applesauce and beat 2 minutes or until creamy.

14. Beat in milk.
15. Add flour mixture and mix on low until moistened.
16. Pour batter into prepared baking dish and bake 20-25 minutes or until cake springs back when pressed.
17. Cool completely in dish on a rack.

Voici une recette de Flaky Pastry :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 8 oz. flour
- squeeze of lemon juice
- cold water (to mix)
- pinch of salt
- 5 to 6 oz. shortening and margarine, mixed

Étapes de préparation :
1. Add the salt to the flour.
2. Soften shortening and margarine, blending thoroughly with a broad bladed knife.
3. Divide softened fat into quarters and rub one portion into the flour and salt. Now mix an elastic dough with about 1/4 pint of cold water, adding a squeeze of lemon juice.
4. Place the dough on a floured board and roll out into an oblong, keeping the sides straight.
5. "Flake" 1/4 of fat into small pieces over 2/3 of the dough.
6. Dredge the entire surface with flour and fold the bottom 1/3 up and the top 1/3 down. Turn the pastry to bring folded edge to the right; repeat rolling, flaking and folding twice more.

Étapes de préparation :
1. Combine oil, boiling water, bran, honey and salt.
2. Stir to blend; cool to lukewarm.
3. Add yeast which has been softened in lukewarm water.
4. Add flour gradually to make soft dough.
5. Knead until smooth and satiny.
6. Let rise to double in bulk (about 1 1/2 hours).
7. Grease hands well (dough is very sticky); form into rolls.

Ingrédients nécessaires :

- 2 c. cake flour
- 1 tsp. baking soda
- 1/3 c. vegetable oil
- 2/3 c. sour milk
- 1/2 c. finely chopped nuts
- 1 1/3 c. sugar, divided
- 1 tsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 c. ripe bananas, mashed
- 1 tsp. vanilla extract
- frosting of your choice

Étapes de préparation :
1. Beat egg whites until frothy.
2. Beat in 1/3 cup sugar.
3. Beat until very stiff and glossy.
4. Sift remaining 1 cup sugar, cake flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt into another bowl. Add oil, bananas, half of the sour milk and the vanilla. Beat for 1 minute at medium speed.
5. Add remaining sour milk and the egg yolks. Beat 1 minute longer. Fold in egg whites. Gently fold in nuts.
6. Gently spoon into 2 greased and floured 8-inch cake pans. Bake in a preheated 350° oven for 35 minutes.
7. Let cool.
8. Fill and frost as desired.
9. Makes 10 servings.

Étapes de préparation :

6. Repeat with remaining flour and bananas.

- 7 lb. watermelon rind
- 7 c. sugar
- 2 c. apple vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. oil of cloves
- 1/2 tsp. oil of cinnamon

Étapes de préparation :
1. Trim off green and pink parts of watermelon rind; cut to 1-inch cubes.
2. Parboil until tender, but not soft.
3. Drain. Combine sugar, vinegar, oil of cloves and oil of cinnamon; bring to boiling and pour over rind.
4. Let stand overnight.
5. In the morning, drain off syrup.
6. Heat and put over rind.
7. The third morning, heat rind and syrup; seal in hot, sterilized jars.
8. Makes 8 pints.
9. (Oil of cinnamon and clove keeps rind clear and transparent.)

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poisson et haricots, elle ne doit pas contenir de gluten ni de sésame
response:
Voici une recette de Deviled Eggs :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 12 hard boiled eggs
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. mustard
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
- dash of paprika

Étapes de préparation :
1. Cut eggs in half and remove yolks.
2. Mash yolks with mayonnaise, mustard, sugar, salt, pepper and vinegar.
3. Stuff back into egg white halves, sprinkle on paprika.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec pommes de terre et lentilles, elle ne doit pas contenir de cacahuètes
response:
Voici une recette de Green Jello Salad :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 pkg. lime Jell-O
- 1 carton cottage cheese
- 1 can drained, crushed pineapple
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. white vinegar
- 2 c. water

Étapes de préparation :
1. Dissolve Jell-O in 1 cup boiling water.
2. Add 1 cup cold water. Mix with other ingredients and chill until set.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec lentilles et poulet, elle ne doit pas contenir de soja ni de fruits de mer
response:
Voici une recette de Salmon Loaf :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 large can pink salmon
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. pepper
- 1/2 c. hot milk
- 1/2 c. cracker crumbs
- 1/4 tsp. paprika
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 2 egg yolks
- 3 egg whites

Étapes de préparation :
1. Remove skin and bones from salmon; mash fine.
2. Add salt, pepper, paprika, lemon juice, beaten egg yolks, cracker crumbs and hot milk.
3. Fold in egg whites, which have been beaten stiff.
4. Pour into well-greased pan.
5. Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

Serves 4 to 5.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec pommes de terre et riz, elle ne doit pas contenir de gluten ni de fruits de mer
response:
Voici une recette de Potato Soup :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 6 diced potatoes
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 2 ribs chopped celery
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 8 slices bacon
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 2 c. milk

Étapes de préparation :
1. Boil potatoes, celery, onions and salt.
2. Fry bacon.
3. Pour off 6 tablespoons of drippings.
4. Stir flour into drippings.
5. Cook a few minutes.
6. Add milk, stirring constantly until thickened.
7. Add bacon and sauce to potatoes.
8. Heat and serve.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec haricots, ail et pâtes, elle ne doit pas contenir de lactose ni de fruits à coque
response:
Voici une recette de Light 'N Easy Chicken And Rice Casserole :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 c. long grain rice
- 6 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
- 2 Tbsp. margarine
- 2 tsp. parsley
- salt and pepper
- 1 c. sliced celery
- 3/4 c. chopped onion
- 1 (10 1/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup
- 1 c. nonfat yogurt
- 2 c. carrots, sliced
- paprika

Étapes de préparation :
1. Cook rice according to package directions.
2. Combine cooked rice and next 5 ingredients.
3. Mix; place into a lightly greased baking dish.
4. Top with chicken breast.
5. Combine soup and yogurt; spoon over chicken breasts.
6. Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 30 minutes.
7. Remove from oven.
8. Add carrots; top with paprika.
9. Bake an additional 15 minutes.
10. Makes 6 servings.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec ail, lentilles et poisson, elle ne doit pas contenir de soja ni de lactose
response:
Voici une recette de Baked Chicken Bundles :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 (5 oz.) pkg. Rice-A-Roni chicken mushroom
- 4 whole skinless chicken breasts
- 1/4 c. milk
- 1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
- 1/4 c. melted butter
- 1/4 c. thyme
- 1/8 tsp. pepper

Étapes de préparation :
1. Preheat oven to 375°.
2. Prepare Rice-A-Roni according to package.
3. Pound chicken breast halves into 1/4-inch thickness.
4. Put equal amounts of Rice-A-Roni on each breast half.
5. Roll chicken up to enclose filling.
6. Secure with a wooden pick.
7. Dip chicken into milk; roll in bread crumbs.
8. Put in a 13 x 9-inch baking dish.

response:
Voici une recette de Low Calorie Tuna Salad :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 cans water packed tuna, drained
- 4 Tbsp. no-fat Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 6 packets Equal brand sweetener
- salt and pepper to taste

Étapes de préparation :
1. Put drained tuna into bowl and shred with fork tines.
2. Add the no-fat Miracle Whip salad dressing.
3. Pour Equal sweetener onto the Miracle Whip and stir well. Salt and pepper to taste.
4. Great on toasted bread!

Serves 8.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec pommes de terre et tomates, elle ne doit pas contenir de moutarde ni de soja
response:
Voici une recette de Pimento Spread :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 lb. Velveeta cheese
- 1 (12 oz.) can evaporated milk
- 1 (7 oz.) jar chopped pimentos
- 1 c. grated Cheddar cheese (medium or sharp, whichever you prefer)
- mayonnaise

Étapes de préparation :
1. While the Velveeta is still cold, cut into small cubes.
2. Place in the top of double boiler set over hot water and allow cheese to melt.
3. When it is melted, stir in evaporated milk and pimentos. Cook over medium heat until slightly thickened, about 30 minutes. Cool and add Cheddar cheese and enough mayonnaise to moisten and for taste.
4. Use for sandwiches, filling for celery sticks, crackers, etc.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec oignons et ail, elle ne doit pas contenir de soja
response:
Voici une recette de Coconut Cake :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 c. plain flour
- 2 tsp. baking powder
- 1 stick margarine
- 2 c. sugar
- 4 eggs
- 2 tsp. vanilla flavoring
- 1 c. milk
- 1/4 tsp. salt

Étapes de préparation :
1. Beat eggs well.
2. Add sugar and beat well.
3. Add flour, baking powder and salt sifted together; beat.
4. Heat milk and margarine to boiling.
5. Gradually add to batter.
6. Add vanilla and blend well. Pour into three greased and floured pans.
7. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec ail, oignons et carottes, elle ne doit pas contenir de cacahuètes
response:
Voici une recette de Creamed Tacos :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 1 1/2 lb. ground beef
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 1 medium bell pepper, chopped
- 1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
- 1 large can Pet milk (evaporated)
- 1 lb. Velveeta cheese
- 1 pkg. flour tortillas (any size)
- jalapeno peppers (optional)

Étapes de préparation :
1. Cook ground beef, onion and bell pepper together in a skillet; drain meat.
2. In double boiler, mix the Ro-Tel tomatoes, evaporated milk and Velveeta cheese; heat until cheese melts.
3. Layer ingredients from skillet on bottom of ungreased casserole dish, then spread cheese ingredients on top of meat, then layer flour tortillas.
4. Repeat layers until all ingredients are used.
5. Bake together in a 350° oven for 30 minutes.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec poivrons, carottes et pommes de terre, elle ne doit pas contenir de fruits à coque ni de fruits de mer
response:
Voici une recette de Black Bean Chili In 20 Minutes :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 2 (15 or 16 oz. cans) black beans, drained
- 1 (14 1/2 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. olive oil or white wine
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 1 green pepper, chopped in large pieces
- 2 large garlic cloves, minced
- 2 Tbsp. ground cumin
- 2 Tbsp. chili powder
- 1 Tbsp. brown sugar

Étapes de préparation :
1. Saute onion in oil or wine.
2. Add green pepper, garlic and cumin.
3. Stir in chili powder and saute.
4. Add beans and tomatoes. Stir in brown sugar.
5. Cover; simmer on low heat for 10 minutes. Serve over couscous or brown rice.
6. Top with cheese over a baked potato.
7. Can be used as a dip with tortilla chips.

instruction: Propose moi une recette avec carottes et tomates, elle ne doit pas contenir de soja
response:
Voici une recette de Vidalia Onion Casserole :

Ingrédients nécessaires :
- 6 medium onions, sliced
- 1 pt. sour cream
- 1 can water chestnuts
- 1/2 tsp. paprika
- 1/4 c. butter
- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- 2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
- 2 c. Ritz crackers, crushed

Étapes de préparation :
1. In greased casserole, arrange onions.
2. Mix together other ingredients except cracker crumbs and pour over onions.
3. Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.
4. Top with cracker crumbs.
